channel.title: Blogs on svs
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on svs

item.title: Hello
item.description: This is one more in a long line of blogs set up by me. Seems I have one from every stage in my life. I had a movies and book review blog back in the early 2000s, then my Ruby focussed blog at http://svs.io, then a medium site, poorly maintained and sporadically updated and now this - something minimal with Hugo, blogging in emacs and publishing with a git push.
